definitions.definition: Introduces the first of two (or occasionally more) options or possibilities, the second (or last) of which is introduced by “ or ” .
examples: Either you eat your dinner or you go to your room.
You can have either potatoes or rice with that, but not both.
You'll be either early, late, or on time.
Either you'll finish your homework or you'll be grounded you home.

main_definition: Introduces the first of two (or occasionally more) options or possibilities, the second (or last) of which is introduced by “ or ” .
